lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He told the plant's workforce that an internationally-active company like VW must be able to adjust to changed economic conditions and manage situations in which unfavourable currency relations restrict its room for financial maneuver.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Summing up his predictions, Briam said limits to growth were becoming apparent on the VW group's most important markets but there were no grounds for great worries.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Walter Hiller, the chairman of VW's works council, told the same Wolfsburg meeting that a cut in the working week to 35 hours was necessary to help reduce unemployment.
